title: Young, Only Once
description: Learning how to downhill ski was on Hank Lawsons to-do list.The opportunity to work as a bartender at a ski resort was the ticket.The girlfriend held a differing view, given Snow Mountains reputation among the singles crowd.What could be the conflict?All Hank had to do was learn a new job, a new sport, and interact successfully with his new co-workers, fifteen college girls hired for the busy season in the lounge, the Snow Girls...
author: Lee DeBourg
